name: The Grand Resort and Spa

reviews.text: Just returned from a long weekend stay at the Grand Resort and Spa and loved every minute of it.
reviews.title: A great stay at the Grand Resort and Spa

reviews.text: I have stayed twice at this resort in the last 2 yeaars and felt I should add my opinions.
reviews.title: Really relaxing

reviews.text: Sadly this time we arrived shortly after Hurricane Wilma had passed through the area, and the damage to the gardens and roof was obvious, but regardless we had a lovely time. (In fact the hotel was in much better shape than some of the parts of town we drove through to get there!!)
reviews.title: Absoultely Wonderful

reviews.text: The resort is very quiet with 2 distinct areas around the gorgeous swimming pool and around the spa pool. It's nice to chat with other guests who don't seem to have that "Miami Attitude" and the staff are extremely helpful and friendly.
reviews.title: One of the Best Gay Resorts in the Country

reviews.text: On both occasions I have stayed in the cheaper old rooms on the second floor around the pool, but found them to be of a very high standard; clean, spacious, and well appointed with a small fridge and microwave. Not quite sure why the walk in closet is bigger than the bathroom?!
reviews.title: Wonderful Resort and EXTRA friendly & professional Staff

reviews.text: There is also a nice little breakfast/coffee room with a couple of internet computers which is always useful when away from home.
reviews.title: Loved It!

description: The Grand Resort and Spa is Fort Lauderdale Beach's largest gay owned men's resort and spa. 33 updated stylish rooms and suites all with flat panel TVs and Blu Ray DVD players. Just steps to the Atlantic Ocean, we take great strides to ensure that your stay is enjoyable and carefree. You will sense an exceptional friendliness and warmth each time you visit. "The Spa at the Grand Resort" is also open to the public.
